PhysX for Virtools » Building Blocks » D6


PJD6SetSoftLimit is categorized in D6

See PJD6.cmo.

Description

Apply to a 3DEntity
Modifies D6 joint limits.

Technical Information

In: triggers the process
Out: is activated when the process is completed.

Body B: The second body to identfy the joint.

Limit Axis: The target limit axis. See D6LimitAxis.
Soft Limit: The new limit. See pJD6SoftLimit.

See Angular Limits

See Linear Limits
